label: 主税寮
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A bureau in the Minbushō (Popular Affairs Minsitry) which controlled the agricultural produce tax (so) and receipts and disbursements from government granaries in the provinces  (p. 810). [民部省、租] [HW: also read ちからのつかさ、しゅぜいりょう]
